023package org.opt4j.core.config.visualization;
024
025import java.awt.BorderLayout;
026import java.awt.Component;
027import java.awt.Point;
028import java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable;
029import java.awt.dnd.DnDConstants;
030import java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent;
031import java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener;
032import java.awt.dnd.DragSource;
033import java.awt.dnd.DragSourceAdapter;
034import java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener;
035import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
036import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;
037import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
038import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
039import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
040import java.util.ArrayList;
041import java.util.Collections;
042import java.util.Comparator;
043import java.util.Enumeration;
044import java.util.HashMap;
045import java.util.HashSet;
046import java.util.List;
047import java.util.Map;
048import java.util.Map.Entry;
049import java.util.Set;
050import java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException;
051
052import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
053import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
054import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
055import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
056import javax.swing.JTree;
057import javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants;
058import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
059import javax.swing.ToolTipManager;
060import javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode;
061import javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeCellRenderer;
062import javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeSelectionModel;
063import javax.swing.tree.TreeNode;
064import javax.swing.tree.TreeSelectionModel;
065
066import org.opt4j.core.config.Icons;
067import org.opt4j.core.config.ModuleRegister;
068import org.opt4j.core.config.PropertyModule;
069import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Category;
070import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Multi;
071import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Parent;
072
073import com.google.inject.Inject;
074import com.google.inject.Module;

076/**
077 * The {@link DefaultModulesPanel}. This implementation is a tree of all
078 * available modules.
079 * 
080 * @author lukasiewycz
081 * 
082 */
083@SuppressWarnings("serial")
084public class DefaultModulesPanel extends ModulesPanel {
085
086        protected final Format format;
087
088        protected final ModuleRegister allModules;
089
090        protected final SelectedModules selectedModules;
091
092        protected final RootTreeNode root = new RootTreeNode(true);
093
094        protected JTree tree = null;
095
096        protected final JPopupMenu moduleMenu = new JPopupMenu();
097
098        /**
099         * The {@link UserNode} is a basic node of the tree.
100         */
101        protected abstract class UserNode extends DefaultMutableTreeNode {
102
103                public UserNode(Object object) {
104                        super(object);
105                }
106
107                @Override
108                public String toString() {
109                        return format.getName(getType());
110                }
111
112                public ImageIcon getIcon() {
113                        return format.getIcon(getType());
114                }
115
116                public String getTooltip() {
117                        return format.getTooltip(getType());
118                }
119
120                public abstract Class<?> getType();
121        }
122
123        /**
124         * The {@link RootTreeNode} is the root node of the tree.
125         */
126        protected class RootTreeNode extends UserNode {
127
128                public RootTreeNode(boolean b) {
129                        super(b);
130                }
131
132                public void setLoading(boolean b) {
133                        userObject = b;
134                }
135
136                public boolean isLoading() {
137                        return (Boolean) userObject;
138                }
139
140                @Override
141                public ImageIcon getIcon() {
142                        if (isLoading()) {
143                                ImageIcon icon = Icons.getIcon(Icons.LOADING);
144                                icon.setImageObserver(tree);
145                                return icon;
146                        }
147                        return format.asFolder(null);
148                }
149
150                @Override
151                public String toString() {
152                        if (isLoading()) {
153                                return "Loading";
154                        }
155                        return "Modules";
156                }
157
158                @Override
159                public String getTooltip() {
160                        return null;
161                }
162
163                @Override
164                public Class<?> getType() {
165                        return null;
166                }
167        }
168
169        /**
170         * The {@link ModuleTreeNode} is used for nodes that represent modules.
171         */
172        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
173        protected class ModuleTreeNode extends UserNode {
174                public ModuleTreeNode(Class<? extends Module> module) {
175                        super(module);
176                }
177
178                public PropertyModule getModule() {
179                        return allModules.get((Class<? extends Module>) userObject);
180                }
181
182                @Override
183                public Class<?> getType() {
184                        return (Class<?>) userObject;
185                }
186        }
187
188        /**
189         * The {@link CategoryTreeNode} is used for nodes that represent categories.
190         */
191        protected class CategoryTreeNode extends UserNode {
192
193                public CategoryTreeNode(Class<?> clazz) {
194                        super(clazz);
195                }
196
197                @Override
198                public Class<?> getType() {
199                        return (Class<?>) userObject;
200                }
201
202                @Override
203                public String toString() {
204                        return format.getName(getType());
205                }
206
207                @Override
208                public ImageIcon getIcon() {
209                        return format.asFolder(super.getIcon());
210                }
211        }
212
213        /**
214         * The {@link Default} category interface.
215         * 
216         * @author lukasiewycz
217         * 
218         */
219        @Category("Default")
220        class Default {
221
222        }
223
224        /**
225         * The {@link TreeCellRenderer} for the modules tree.
226         * 
227         */
228        protected static class TreeCellRenderer extends DefaultTreeCellRenderer {
229                @Override
230                public Component getTreeCellRendererComponent(JTree tree, Object value, boolean sel, boolean expanded,
231                                boolean leaf, int row, boolean hasFocus) {
232                        Component comp = super.getTreeCellRendererComponent(tree, value, sel, expanded, leaf, row, hasFocus);
233
234                        ImageIcon icon = null;
235                        String tooltip = null;
236
237                        if (value instanceof UserNode) {
238                                UserNode userNode = (UserNode) value;
239                                icon = userNode.getIcon();
240                                tooltip = userNode.getTooltip();
241                        }
242                        if (icon == null) {
243                                icon = Icons.getDefault();
244                        }
245
246                        setIcon(icon);
247                        setToolTipText(tooltip);
248
249                        return comp;
250                }
251        }
252
253        /**
254         * The {@link MyTree} that extends a {@link JTree} by a drag method.
255         * 
256         */
257        protected static class MyTree extends JTree implements DragGestureListener {
258
259                protected DragSource dragSource = null;
260
261                protected DragSourceListener dragSourceListener = new DragSourceAdapter() {
262                };
263
264                public MyTree(TreeNode root) {
265                        super(root);
266
267                        dragSource = new DragSource();
268                        dragSource.createDefaultDragGestureRecognizer(this, DnDConstants.ACTION_MOVE, this);
269                }
270
271                @Override
272                public void dragGestureRecognized(DragGestureEvent dge) {
273                        TreeNode node = (TreeNode) this.getLastSelectedPathComponent();
274
275                        if (node instanceof ModuleTreeNode) {
276                                ModuleTreeNode moduleNode = (ModuleTreeNode) node;
277                                PropertyModule module = moduleNode.getModule();
278
279                                Transferable transferable = new ModuleTransferable(module);
280
281                                dragSource.startDrag(dge, DragSource.DefaultMoveDrop, transferable, dragSourceListener);
282                        }
283                }
284
285        }
286
287        /**
288         * Constructs a {@link DefaultModulesPanel}.
289         * 
290         * @param format
291         *            the format
292         * @param allModules
293         *            the set of all modules
294         * @param selectedModules
295         *            the set of selected modules
296         */
297        @Inject
298        public DefaultModulesPanel(Format format, ModuleRegister allModules, SelectedModules selectedModules) {
299                super();
300                this.format = format;
301                this.allModules = allModules;
302                this.selectedModules = selectedModules;
303        }
304
305        /*
306         * (non-Javadoc)
307         * 
308         * @see org.opt4j.conf.gui.Startupable#startup()
309         */
310        @Override
311        public void startup() {
312
313                tree = new MyTree(root);
314                tree.setToggleClickCount(1000); // don't expand on double click hack
315                tree.addMouseListener(mouseListener);
316                tree.setCellRenderer(new TreeCellRenderer());
317                tree.setSelectionModel(null);
318
319                ToolTipManager.sharedInstance().registerComponent(tree);
320
321                JScrollPane scroll = new JScrollPane(tree, ScrollPaneConstants.VERTICAL_SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS,
322                                ScrollPaneConstants.HORIZONTAL_SCROLLBAR_AS_NEEDED);
323
324                setLayout(new BorderLayout());
325                add(scroll, BorderLayout.CENTER);
326
327                Thread thread = new Thread() {
328                        @Override
329                        public void run() {
330                                try {
331                                        populateTree();
332                                } catch (RejectedExecutionException e) {
333                                }
334                        }
335                };
336                thread.setPriority(Thread.MIN_PRIORITY);
337                thread.start();
338        }
339
340        private Class<?> getCategory(Class<?> clazz, boolean include) {
341                if (include && isCategory(clazz)) {
342                        return clazz;
343                }
344                if (clazz.equals(Object.class)) {
345                        return null;
346                } else if (clazz.getAnnotation(Parent.class) != null) {
347                        Class<?> pClass = clazz.getAnnotation(Parent.class).value();
348                        return pClass;
349                } else {
350                        assert (clazz.getSuperclass() != null) : clazz;
351                        return getCategory(clazz.getSuperclass(), true);
352                }
353        }
354
355        private boolean isCategory(Class<?> clazz) {
356                Category category = clazz.getAnnotation(Category.class);
357                return (category != null);
358        }
359
360        /**
361         * Build and order the tree
362         */
363        protected void populateTree() {
364                // get all relevant categories
365
366                // map from the modules (categories) to their categories
367                // (supercategories)
368                Map<Class<?>, Class<?>> map = new HashMap<>();
369
370                for (Class<? extends Module> module : allModules) {
371                        Class<?> category = getCategory(module, false);
372                        assert (!module.equals(category)) : module;
373                        map.put(module, category);
374                }
375
376                int size;
377                do {
378                        size = map.size();
379                        Set<Class<?>> values = new HashSet<>(map.values());
380                        for (Class<?> cat : values) {
381                                if (cat != null) {
382                                        Class<?> category = getCategory(cat, false);
383                                        map.put(cat, category);
384                                }
385                        }
386                } while (map.size() != size);
387
388                // create all nodes
389                Map<Class<?>, CategoryTreeNode> ctn = new HashMap<>();
390                Map<Class<?>, ModuleTreeNode> mtn = new HashMap<>();
391                Map<Class<?>, DefaultMutableTreeNode> atn = new HashMap<>();
392
393                for (Class<?> clazz : map.keySet()) {
394                        if (isCategory(clazz)) {
395                                CategoryTreeNode node = new CategoryTreeNode(clazz);
396                                ctn.put(clazz, node);
397                        } else {
398                                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
399                                ModuleTreeNode node = new ModuleTreeNode((Class<? extends Module>) clazz);
400                                mtn.put(clazz, node);
401                        }
402                }
403                atn.putAll(ctn);
404                atn.putAll(mtn);
405
406                // create hierarchy by parent annotation
407                CategoryTreeNode def = new CategoryTreeNode(Default.class);
408                root.add(def);
409                for (Entry<Class<?>, DefaultMutableTreeNode> entry : atn.entrySet()) {
410                        Class<?> clazz = entry.getKey();
411                        DefaultMutableTreeNode node = entry.getValue();
412
413                        Class<?> category = map.get(clazz);
414
415                        if (category == null) {
416                                if (isCategory(clazz)) {
417                                        root.add(node);
418                                } else {
419                                        def.add(node);
420                                }
421                        } else {
422                                DefaultMutableTreeNode n = atn.get(category);
423                                assert (n != null && n != node) : clazz + " " + category;
424                                n.add(node);
425                        }
426
427                }
428
429                // clean empty categories
430                boolean removed;
431                do {
432                        removed = removeEmptyCategories(root);
433                } while (removed);
434
435                SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
436                        @Override
437                        public void run() {
438                                tree.setSelectionModel(new DefaultTreeSelectionModel());
439                                tree.getSelectionModel().setSelectionMode(TreeSelectionModel.SINGLE_TREE_SELECTION);
440                                root.setLoading(false);
441                                sort(tree);
442                                tree.expandRow(0);
443                        }
444                });
445                revalidate();
446                repaint();
447        }
448
449        /**
450         * Removes empty categories. This method can create some new empty
451         * categories!
452         * 
453         * @param current
454         *            the current node
455         * @return true if an empty category was removed
456         */
457        private boolean removeEmptyCategories(DefaultMutableTreeNode current) {
458                if (!current.children().hasMoreElements()) {
459                        return false;
460                }
461
462                TreeNode node = current.getFirstChild();
463                boolean removed = false;
464                while (node != null) {
465                        DefaultMutableTreeNode n = (DefaultMutableTreeNode) node;
466                        node = current.getChildAfter(n);
467
468                        if (n.isLeaf()) {
469                                if (n instanceof CategoryTreeNode && n.getChildCount() == 0) {
470                                        DefaultMutableTreeNode parent = (DefaultMutableTreeNode) n.getParent();
471                                        parent.remove(n);
472                                        removed = true;
473                                }
474                        } else {
475                                removed = removed || removeEmptyCategories(n);
476                        }
477                }
478                return removed;
479        }
480
481        protected MouseListener mouseListener = new MouseAdapter() {
482
483                @Override
484                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
485                        if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {
486                                displayMenu(e);
487                        }
488                }
489
490                @Override
491                public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
492                        int count = e.getClickCount();
493
494                        if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {
495                                displayMenu(e);
496                        } else if (count > 1) {
497                                Object object = tree.getLastSelectedPathComponent();
498                                if (object instanceof ModuleTreeNode) {
499                                        ModuleTreeNode node = (ModuleTreeNode) object;
500                                        PropertyModule pmodule = node.getModule();
501                                        if (selectedModules.contains(pmodule)) {
502                                                remove(pmodule);
503                                        } else {
504                                                add(pmodule);
505                                        }
506                                }
507                        }
508                }
509        };
510
511        /**
512         * Adds a new {@link PropertyModule}.
513         * 
514         * @param pm
515         *            the property module to be added
516         */
517        protected void add(PropertyModule pm) {
518                Module module = pm.getModule();
519                if (module.getClass().getAnnotation(Multi.class) != null) {
520                        try {
521                                Module m2 = module.getClass().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
522                                PropertyModule pm2 = new PropertyModule(m2);
523                                selectedModules.add(pm2);
524                        } catch (InstantiationException e1) {
525                                e1.printStackTrace();
526                        } catch (IllegalAccessException e1) {
527                                e1.printStackTrace();
528                        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
529                                e.printStackTrace();
530                        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
531                                e.printStackTrace();
532                        } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
533                                e.printStackTrace();
534                        } catch (SecurityException e) {
535                                e.printStackTrace();
536                        }
537                } else {
538                        selectedModules.add(pm);
539                }
540        }
541
542        /**
543         * Removes a {@link PropertyModule}.
544         * 
545         * @param pm
546         *            the property module to be removed
547         */
548        protected void remove(PropertyModule pm) {
549                selectedModules.remove(pm);
550        }
551
552        /**
553         * Displays a popup menu for the tree elements.
554         * 
555         * @param e
556         *            the mouse event
557         */
558        protected void displayMenu(MouseEvent e) {
559                if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {
560                        Point pt = e.getPoint();
561                        tree.setSelectionPath(tree.getPathForLocation(pt.x, pt.y));
562
563                        Object object = tree.getLastSelectedPathComponent();
564                        if (object instanceof ModuleTreeNode) {
565
566                                ModuleTreeNode node = (ModuleTreeNode) object;
567                                final PropertyModule module = node.getModule();
568
569                                moduleMenu.removeAll();
570
571                                JMenuItem add = new JMenuItem("Add Module", Icons.getIcon(Icons.ADD));
572                                add.addActionListener((ActionEvent event) -> add(module));
573
574                                JMenuItem remove = new JMenuItem("Remove Module", Icons.getIcon(Icons.DELETE));
575                                remove.addActionListener((ActionEvent event) -> remove(module));
576
577                                if (selectedModules.contains(module)) {
578                                        add.setEnabled(false);
579                                } else {
580                                        remove.setEnabled(false);
581                                }
582
583                                moduleMenu.add(add);
584                                moduleMenu.add(remove);
585                                moduleMenu.show(e.getComponent(), e.getX(), e.getY());
586                        }
587
588                }
589        }
590
591        /**
592         * Sorts the {@link JTree} alphabetically.
593         * 
594         * @param tree
595         *            the tree to be sorted
596         */
597        protected void sort(JTree tree) {
598                DefaultMutableTreeNode root = (DefaultMutableTreeNode) tree.getModel().getRoot();
599                sort(root);
600
601        }
602
603        /**
604         * Sorts the child elements of one tree node alphabetically.
605         * 
606         * @param node
607         *            the node which children are sorted
608         */
609        protected void sort(DefaultMutableTreeNode node) {
610                if (!node.children().hasMoreElements()) {
611                        return;
612                }
613
614                List<UserNode> nodes = new ArrayList<>();
615
616                Enumeration<?> children = node.children();
617
618                while (children.hasMoreElements()) {
619                        UserNode n = (UserNode) children.nextElement();
620                        nodes.add(n);
621                }
622
623                Collections.sort(nodes, new Comparator<UserNode>() {
624                        @Override
625                        public int compare(UserNode o1, UserNode o2) {
626                                boolean cat1 = o1 instanceof CategoryTreeNode;
627                                boolean cat2 = o2 instanceof CategoryTreeNode;
628
629                                if (cat1 && !cat2) {
630                                        return -1;
631                                } else if (!cat1 && cat2) {
632                                        return 1;
633                                } else {
634                                        return o1.toString().compareTo(o2.toString());
635                                }
636                        }
637                });
638
639                node.removeAllChildren();
640
641                for (UserNode n : nodes) {
642                        node.add(n);
643                        sort(n);
644                }
645        }
646
647}
